root.name: Streets of Fury
root.description: Streets of Fury is an Xbox Live indie game that was released shortly after the program's launch. The gameplay is similar to Final Fight or Streets of Rage in which you go along a side scrolling stage beating people up. The game's main draw comes from it's graphics which use digitized sprites in a similar style to several early 90s games such as Way of the Warrior or Kasumi Ninja.In late 2013, developer Cyrille Lagarigue began work on porting the game with enhancements to various platforms.
